  PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_LDO1 = 2, PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_LDO2 = 3, PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_MAX = (PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_LDO2 + 1)

 Get PMIC ops structure. All the other functions are accessed via function pointers whose array is exported by this function. More...
 
void PMHALLP8731ConfigureRegulatorMap (pmhalLP8731RegulatorMapPtr_t regulatorMap)
 The PMIC regulator output to the device input mapping can be different on different boards. This API can be used to provide a different mapping to the PMIC driver if the mapping does not

match the default. Example table is shown below:

| Device voltage Rail | Ptr to Regulator |

| PMHAL_PRCM_PMIC_REGULATOR_CORE | PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_BUCK1 | | PMHAL_PRCM_PMIC_REGULATOR_DSPEVE| PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_BUCK2 | | .... | | index (Refer | For index of the | | pmhalPrcmPmicRegulatorId_t) | gPmhalLP8731Regulator | | | refer |

| | pmhalLP8731RegulatorId_t |

This table when translated to code is as below: pmhalLP8731RegulatorMap_t regulatorMap[ PMHAL_PRCM_PMIC_REGULATOR_COUNT] = { { &gPmhalLP8731Regulator[PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_BUCK1], I2C_INSTANCE, PMIC_I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS }, { &gPmhalLP8731Regulator[PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_BUCK2], I2C_INSTANCE, PMIC_I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS }, ...... };. More...
 

Variables

const pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp_t gPmhalLP8731Regulator [PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_MAX]
 

Detailed Description

The Power Management IC (PMIC) L8731 specific API definition.

The APIs defined here are to control the voltage of the PMIC rails and to query the status.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum pmhalLP8731RegulatorId

Abstract Enumeration for the Regulators.

Enumerator
PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_INVALID 

Invalid PMIC regulator ID

PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_MIN 

Minimum Abstracted PMIC Regulator ID

PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_BUCK1 

Abstracted PMIC Regulator ID for LP8731 BUCK 1

PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_BUCK2 

Abstracted PMIC Regulator ID for LP8731 BUCK 2

PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_LDO1 

Abstracted PMIC Regulator ID for LP8731 LDO 1

PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_LDO2 

Abstracted PMIC Regulator ID for LP8731 LDO 2

PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_MAX 

Maximum Abstracted PMIC Regulator ID

Function Documentation

void PMHALLP8731ConfigureRegulatorMap ( pmhalLP8731RegulatorMapPtr_t  regulatorMap)

The PMIC regulator output to the device input mapping can be different on different boards. This API can be used to provide a different mapping to the PMIC driver if the mapping does not

match the default. Example table is shown below:

| Device voltage Rail | Ptr to Regulator |

| PMHAL_PRCM_PMIC_REGULATOR_CORE | PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_BUCK1 | | PMHAL_PRCM_PMIC_REGULATOR_DSPEVE| PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_BUCK2 | | .... | | index (Refer | For index of the | | pmhalPrcmPmicRegulatorId_t) | gPmhalLP8731Regulator | | | refer |

| | pmhalLP8731RegulatorId_t |

This table when translated to code is as below: pmhalLP8731RegulatorMap_t regulatorMap[ PMHAL_PRCM_PMIC_REGULATOR_COUNT] = { { &gPmhalLP8731Regulator[PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_BUCK1], I2C_INSTANCE, PMIC_I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS }, { &gPmhalLP8731Regulator[PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_BUCK2], I2C_INSTANCE, PMIC_I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS }, ...... };.

Parameters
regulatorMapPointer to the array of pointers which gives the mapping. The array is defined as above.
Returns
None
const pmhalPmicOperations_t* PMHALLP8731GetPMICOps ( void  )

Get PMIC ops structure. All the other functions are accessed via function pointers whose array is exported by this function.

Returns
Return pointer to the PMIC ops structure.

Variable Documentation

const pmhalLP8731RegulatorProp_t gPmhalLP8731Regulator[PMHAL_LP8731_REGULATOR_MAX]

Array of the properties of all the BUCK and LDO PMIC regulators
